title: Leading Health Care Provider in Nebraska and SW Iowa | CHI Health
author: Catholic Health Initiatives
description: CHI Health is a leading provider of high-quality health care throughout Nebraska and Southwest Iowa. Visit one of our hospitals or clinics near you!
cleaned_text: AUG 07, 2023 [ CHI Health Good Samaritan & CHI Health Lakeside awarded 5 stars by CMS ](/content/chi-health/en/about-us/press-room/news-center/2023-news/goodsam-5stars-cms.html) The more stars, the better the hospital performs on the quality measures including mortality, safety of care, readmission, patient experience and timely and effective care.
